footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Kamisato Ayato | Update Date: 08/06/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Ayato in most team compostions will utilize 2 skills per burst. In freeze teams, Ayato will opt to forgo 1 skill use per burst in order to free up field time for other team members.

title: Kamisato Ayato | Team Composition and Synergy
